title: Topic 003 Question 048
body: You have an Azure IoT solution that contains a Device Provisioning Service (DPS) instance and 100 IoT devices.
You plan to configure firewall rules to ensure that the IoT devices only communicate with Azure IoT Hub DPS endpoints.
You need to retrieve the current IP address prefixes for the IoT Hub DPS endpoints.
options: Microsoft Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), part of Microsoft Entra
